text: have you won today I'm making a very
simple recipe that you can put together
in a rush
it's called for Tom Nam or rice noodle
salad with mushrooms is a vegan dish and
a chorus very healthy if you have access
to various kinds of mushrooms you can't
miss out this recipe let's begin
I have here to her gram or seven asses
of varieties of mushrooms like enoki
mushrooms King oyster mushroom shiitake
and shimeji mushrooms etc just remove
the bottom stem or the roots and then
you can rinse with salted water for
small mushrooms like enoki you can just
separate them and for the bigger ones
you can cut into slices now in a large
wok heat about 2 tbsp of vegetable oil
and then fry about 2 to 3 shallots would
I have thickness lights until golden
brown then remove the fried shallots
with a slotted spoon and transfer to a
small bowl that will be used for garnish
later now into the remaining hot oil in
the wok add some minced garlic and fry
into your fragrant then add a quarter
cup of tomato sauce 1/4 cup of soy sauce
and 2 tsp of sugar stir well and simmer
on low for about 30 seconds until
thickened
mmm that smell really good and very
shiny and fragrant you can add some
chili flakes for more heat then turn off
the heat and scoop out about 1/3 of the
sauce and say for dipping later for the
noodles you're gonna give flat rice
noodle you can coat following bucket
instructions and then use your fingers
to remove them separate all the strings
then toss them well with the sauce in
the wall now in a separate pan add about
a tablespoon of vegetable oil and then
fry some minced garlic and your fragrant
then add the mushrooms and cook for
about 1 to 2 minutes until wilted force
more mushrooms like enoki you should add
them later lightly season with some salt
and pepper and turn off the heat
now divide Lenore's into plates and then
pour the stir-fry mushrooms on top
sprinkle with some chopped spring onion
some roasted sesame seeds don't forget
that flavorful fragrance fried shallots
ooh and you can serve with a few fresh
tomato slices and the dipping sauce that
we have saved earlier it's very simple
but you're gonna be surprised how good
it will taste give it a shot and let me
know how it turns out send me a photo if
you do and put on instagram with hashtag
Helen recipes so I can enjoy your dishes
this recipe together with so many other
fur and noodle recipes can be found in
